    • org.apache.hadoop.mapredでのJobContextの使用

      org.apache.hadoop.mapredでのJobContextのサブインタフェース 
      修飾子とタイプ インタフェースと説明
      interface  JobContext 
      JobContext型のパラメータを持つorg.apache.hadoop.mapredのメソッド 
      修飾子とタイプ メソッドと説明
      void OutputCommitter.abortJob(JobContext context, org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.JobStatus.State runState)
      This method implements the new interface by calling the old method.
      void OutputCommitter.cleanupJob(JobContext context)
      非推奨です。 
      Use OutputCommitter.commitJob(org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.JobContext) or OutputCommitter.abortJob(org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.JobContext, org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.JobStatus.State) instead.
      void OutputCommitter.commitJob(JobContext context)
      This method implements the new interface by calling the old method.
      void OutputCommitter.setupJob(JobContext jobContext)
      This method implements the new interface by calling the old method.

    • org.apache.hadoop.mapred.libでのJobContextの使用

      JobContext型のパラメータを持つorg.apache.hadoop.mapred.libのメソッド 
      修飾子とタイプ メソッドと説明
      protected boolean CombineFileInputFormat.isSplitable(JobContext context, Path file)
      Subclasses should avoid overriding this method and should instead only override CombineFileInputFormat.isSplitable(FileSystem, Path).

    • org.apache.hadoop.mapreduceでのJobContextの使用

      org.apache.hadoop.mapreduceでのJobContextのサブインタフェース 
      修飾子とタイプ インタフェースと説明
      interface  MapContext<KEYIN,VALUEIN,KEYOUT,VALUEOUT>
      The context that is given to the Mapper.
      interface  ReduceContext<KEYIN,VALUEIN,KEYOUT,VALUEOUT>
      The context passed to the Reducer.
      interface  TaskAttemptContext
      The context for task attempts.
      interface  TaskInputOutputContext<KEYIN,VALUEIN,KEYOUT,VALUEOUT>
      A context object that allows input and output from the task.
      JobContextを実装しているorg.apache.hadoop.mapreduceのクラス 
      修飾子とタイプ クラスと説明
      class  Job
      The job submitter's view of the Job.
      JobContext型のパラメータを持つorg.apache.hadoop.mapreduceのメソッド 
      修飾子とタイプ メソッドと説明
      void OutputCommitter.abortJob(JobContext jobContext, org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.JobStatus.State state)
      For aborting an unsuccessful job's output.
      abstract void OutputFormat.checkOutputSpecs(JobContext context)
      Check for validity of the output-specification for the job.
      void OutputCommitter.cleanupJob(JobContext jobContext)
      非推奨です。 
      Use OutputCommitter.commitJob(JobContext) and OutputCommitter.abortJob(JobContext, JobStatus.State) instead.
      void OutputCommitter.commitJob(JobContext jobContext)
      For committing job's output after successful job completion.
      abstract List<InputSplit> InputFormat.getSplits(JobContext context)
      Logically split the set of input files for the job.
      abstract void OutputCommitter.setupJob(JobContext jobContext)
      For the framework to setup the job output during initialization.
